info.name: SmartRent - Address API (Legacy 63 Provinces)
info.description:
Vietnam Administrative Address API - Traditional 3-Tier Structure (63 provinces)

**Administrative Hierarchy:**
- Province (Tỉnh/Thành phố) - 63 units
- District (Quận/Huyện/Thị xã) - ~700 units  
- Ward (Phường/Xã/Thị trấn) - ~11,000 units

**Features:**
- ID-based operations
- Cascading selection support
- Search functionality
- Unified AddressUnitDTO response

item.name: Province Operations

request.description:
Returns all 63 provinces in Vietnam's traditional administrative structure.

**Response:** List of 63 provinces including 5 centrally-governed cities.

response.name: Success Response

variable.description: Province ID (e.g., 1 for Hà Nội, 79 for HCM)

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific province by its ID.
Search for provinces by name (case-insensitive partial match).

item.description: Operations for managing Vietnamese provinces (63 units)

item.name: District Operations

request.description:
Returns all districts belonging to a specific province.

**Example:** Province 1 (Hà Nội) has 30 districts.

response.name: Hanoi Districts
response.body:
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Quận Ba Đình",
      "code": "001",
      "type": "DISTRICT",
      "level": "DISTRICT",
      "provinceId": 1,
      "provinceName": "Thành phố Hà Nội",
      "isActive": true,
      "fullAddressText": "Quận Ba Đình, Thành phố Hà Nội"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Quận Hoàn Kiếm",
      "code": "002",
      "type": "DISTRICT",
      "level": "DISTRICT",
      "provinceId": 1,
      "provinceName": "Thành phố Hà Nội",
      "isActive": true,
      "fullAddressText": "Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Thành phố Hà Nội"
    }
  ],
  "message": "Successfully retrieved 30 districts for province 1"
}

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific district by its ID.
Search for districts by name, optionally filtered by province.

item.description: Operations for managing Vietnamese districts (~700 units)

item.name: Ward Operations

request.description:
Returns all wards belonging to a specific district.

**Example:** District 1 (Ba Đình) has 14 wards.

response.name: Ba Dinh Wards
response.body:
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Phường Phúc Xá",
      "code": "00001",
      "type": "WARD",
      "level": "WARD",
      "districtId": 1,
      "districtName": "Quận Ba Đình",
      "provinceId": 1,
      "provinceName": "Thành phố Hà Nội",
      "isActive": true,
      "fullAddressText": "Phường Phúc Xá, Quận Ba Đình, Thành phố Hà Nội"
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Phường Trúc Bạch",
      "code": "00004",
      "type": "WARD",
      "level": "WARD",
      "districtId": 1,
      "districtName": "Quận Ba Đình",
      "provinceId": 1,
      "provinceName": "Thành phố Hà Nội",
      "isActive": true,
      "fullAddressText": "Phường Trúc Bạch, Quận Ba Đình, Thành phố Hà Nội"
    }
  ],
  "message": "Successfully retrieved 14 wards for district 1"
}

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific ward by its ID.
Search for wards by name, optionally filtered by district.

item.description: Operations for managing Vietnamese wards (~11,000 units)

request.description: Simple health check endpoint to verify Address API is operational.

response.name: Healthy
